rules_text:
When Garrison Warden enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Surpass {5}{W} [i]({5}{W}: Transform this. This costs {1} less to activate for each counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Flying
Whenever Cyrukan Weaponmaster attacks, amass Soldiers 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It’s also a Soldier. If you don’t control one, create an 0/0 black Soldier Army creature token first.)[/i]
